data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Akhmat Grozny advance rapidly upfield but Sergey Karasev blows for offside.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
In the minute 9, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Akhmat Grozny's Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 16, Goal! Saint Petersburg have got their heads in front thanks to a Daler Kuzyaev strike.
That's a fine assist from Douglas Santos.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 19, Saint Petersburg's Viacheslav Karavaev gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 21, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Bernard Berisha.
Great play from Artem Polyarus to set up the goal.
In the minute 28, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny are pushing forward but Georgi Melkadze's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 29, Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
At Akhmat-Arena, Saint Petersburg are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
In the minute 32, Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Sergey Karasev signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 37, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
In the minute 40, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aleksey Sutormin of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Sergey Karasev awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Saint Petersburg.
The first half has been concluded at Akhmat-Arena.
The second-half has started.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Viacheslav Karavaev with Dmitri Chistyakov.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Saint Petersburg move into a 1-2 lead through a Dejan Lovren header.
Douglas Santos with an assist there.
Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 52, An attacking Akhmat Grozny player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Dmitri Chistyakov (Saint Petersburg) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
Bernard Berisha equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 55, Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Saint Petersburg) has received a first yellow card.
Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sergey Karasev awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 60, Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny push upfield but Sergey Karasev quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Saint Petersburg push forward at Akhmat-Arena and Yuri Zhirkov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Akhmat Grozny defence.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
In the minute 65, Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny just outside Saint Petersburg's area.
Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 66, Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Sergey Semak is making the team's second substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Andrey Mostovoy replacing Yuri Zhirkov.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Akhmat-Arena.
Ismael Silva is replacing Anton Shvets for the home team.
In the minute 70, Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
In the minute 73, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 78, Akhmat Grozny make their second substitution with Lechii Sadulaev replacing Bernard Berisha.
Islam Alsultanov is on a sub for Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Malcom is on a sub for Aleksey Sutormin for Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 82, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 86, Sergey Karasev signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Aleksandr Yerokhin with Stanislav Krapukhin.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny's Georgi Melkadze is caught offside.
Sergey Karasev signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Sergey Karasev blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
Oleg Ivanov is replacing Georgi Melkadze for the home team.
Akhmat Grozny make their fifth substitution with Miroslav Bogosavac replacing Artem Polyarus.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Saint Petersburg) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
